description: Amendments to planning permission dated 16th July 2021 (RN:21/02813/FULL) for Variation of conditions 1 and 29 of planning permission dated 20 August 2020 (RN 20/01739/FULL) which itself varied condition 1 (approved plans) and condition 29 (residential unit numbers) of Planning Permission dated 4 November 2019 (RN:19/01284/FULL) for Demolition of the existing building and redevelopment to provide two buildings: Building 1 comprising one basement level, ground and thirteen upper floors containing car parking, plant, affordable sheltered accommodation and market sheltered accommodation (Class C3), ancillary communal areas; Building 2 comprising sub-basement, two basement levels, ground and eleven upper floors containing plant, car parking, residential accommodation (Class C3) and ancillary leisure; reconfigured vehicular and pedestrian access together with landscaping and other works in association with the development, for Minor design amendments in respect of Building 2 facing St Johns Wood Road: Revised Sub-Station, car parking layout and bin store  to basement 1, Facade revisions- relocation of east elevation windows, realignment of east and west elevation balconies, widening of east and west corner mullions, revised balustrade design at G/1/10th/11th floor level, introduction of decorative grilles to the south elevation at 11th floor; and Landscape revisions - provision of additional roof terrace, amended ground level refuse store and forecourt landscape design, and additional security gates, amendment to condition 29 ( added under reference 20/00928/NMA)  to introduce the provision of a range of residential units numbers between 100 and 112, rather than the absolute 112 units (re-consultation on from RN 20/01739/FULL),  to vary the approved drawing numbers and the number of residential units. Namely, to allow decorative panels to the car lift along the North elevation and resizing of ground floor louvres to the East and west elevation to building 2.
